summary:
Collection of all the Hairstyles i combined that adds a total of 39 Hairstyles
Some of them are 2 to 5 hairstyles mixed into a single hairstyle
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][size=5]BASIC INFO[/size]
Collection of all the Hairstyles i combined that adds a total of 39 Hairstyles
Some of them are 2 to 5 hairstyles mixed into a single hairstyle

[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/25580-1-1427850153.png[/img]

I rarely play Skyrim and leaving this mod on my drive would be a waste so i
decided to upload it for you guys to try too :)

[size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size]
[url=https://www.google.com.ph/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8#safe=off&q=sg+hair+pack+268+edition+by+hellosanta.7z+-+google+drive]SG Hair Pack 268 Edition by HelloSanta[/url]

[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
NMM or MO:
- download the main file
- simply install

MANUAL:
- download the main file
- extract files with winRAR/7zip
- copy file and paste it in your data folder
- start the game and enjoy

[size=5]TUTORIAL[/size]
[youtube]M0A36OHSHN8[/youtube]
